member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExport
member.summary: The Rich Text Format (RTF) export component for ActiveReports for .NET.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExport.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExport.Export(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.PageDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Exports the specified document to a Rich Text Format (RTF) file.
member.param: The ActiveReports PageDocument object to export.
The file name and path to save the main html file to.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExport.Export(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.PageDocument,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Exports the specified document to a Rich Text Format (RTF) file.
member.param: The ActiveReports PageDocument object to export.
The file name and path to save the main html file to.
A range of page numbers to export seperated by a comma. Between each comma can have a single page number, or range of pages with a hyphen between the starting and ending page numbers in the range.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExport.Export(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.PageDocument,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Exports the specified document to the specified stream in Rich Text Format (RTF).
member.param: The ActiveReports PageDocument object to export.
The Stream to write the RTF to.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExport.Export(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.PageDocument,System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Exports the specified document to the specified stream in Rich Text Format (RTF).
member.param: The ActiveReports PageDocument object to export.
The Stream to write the RTF to.
A range of page numbers to export seperated by a comma. Between each comma can have a single page number, or range of pages with a hyphen between the starting and ending page numbers in the range.

member.summary: Exports the specified IReport to file
member.param: IReport instance to Export

A range of page numbers to export seperated by a comma. Between each comma can have a single page number, or range of pages with a hyphen between the starting and ending page numbers in the range.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExport.EnableShapes
member.summary: Setting this value to true will export the Shapes and Lines to RTF Format. You will require Microsoft Word to view it correctly.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExport.Pagination
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicates should pagination be used for resulted RTF document or not

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExportException
member.summary: Thrown when a general RTF export specific error occurs.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExportException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Word.Section.RtfExportException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The Exception instance that caused the current exception.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
